title: Political culture is attitudes of citizens

content.question: The political culture of a nation is best defined as the

choices.label: institutional, legal, and constitutional structure of the government
procedure for selecting top officials in the government
literary works that most influence political leaders
class structure and educational levels of the populace
underlying attitudes and predispositions of citizens toward the political system

content.answer: underlying attitudes and predispositions of citizens toward the political system

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
